name: MXCrashDiagnostic
desc: An object representing a diagnostic report for an app crash.

items.name: var exceptionType: NSNumber?
items.desc: The Mach exception type of the crash.

items.name: var exceptionCode: NSNumber?
items.desc: The encoded processor-specific information for the crash.

items.name: var signal: NSNumber?
items.desc: The signal associated with the crash.

items.name: var terminationReason: String?
items.desc: The reason the app was terminated as a human-readable string.

items.name: var virtualMemoryRegionInfo: String?
items.desc: Information about the region of memory an app accessed incorrectly, resulting in a bad-access crash.

items.name: var callStackTree: MXCallStackTree
items.desc: The call stack for the crash.
